ygData.subject: replacement ideas
ygData.msgSnippet: i d have to say add in a new DOT or weak damage shield if we were going to remove something. don t throw out shadow step tho, it is a very useful spell in the
ygData.messageBody:
i'd have to say add in a new DOT or weak damage shield if we were going to
remove something. don't throw out shadow step tho, it is a very useful spell
in the right circumstances. it is also one of the very best duelling spells
in the game, especially against other tanks :) last time i checked, i could
shadow step while rooted, even tho i stayed rooted once i reappeared (i just
basically moved to a random location without *moving*). if this still works,
shadow step is worth sparing for that reason alone. and no, dont *FIX* that
please! after all you can't abuse it that way to kite, it is just one of an
sk's many avoidance techniques.. and we NEED our avoidance techniques
because of our lack of healing :) that doesn't mean i endorse lifetap spells
tho hehe.. as the last several emails pointed out, they cast slow and have
fairly low output.

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
